name: orchestra-jsapi
description: Vanilla interface layer for harmonyhubjs-* libraries. Leveraged by orchestra and orchestra-webapi.
author: Manuel Alabor <manuel@alabor.me>

scripts.test: standard index.js test/**/*.js && npm run build && node test/support/runner.js
scripts.build: rm -fr dist && mkdir dist && babel --presets es2015 --out-file dist/index.js index.js
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm run build && npm publish && semantic-release post
